item.title: Revisiting the Baader–Meinhof phenomenon
item.description: I will update this post as events unfold. In a previous post, I explained how I set out to test the Baader–Meinhof phenomenon using a randomly chosen set of five topics which I would look out for to determine an average time until they were seen again. Subconscious seeking? Events <2021-10-23 Sat 22:05> — Looking for more topics to extend the group to 10 or 15, the first I found that I had heard of already was… a Robbie Williams album.

item.title: Testing the Baader–Meinhof phenomenon
item.description: Why do I keep seeing certain things again and again?
